### New to Plotly?

Plotly's R library is free and open source!<br>
[Get started](https://plot.ly/r/getting-started/) by downloading the client and [reading the primer](https://plot.ly/r/getting-started/).<br>

### Legend Names
```{r, results = 'hide'}
library(plotly)
p <- plot_ly(x = ~seq(1, 8)) %>%
  add_lines(y = ~rnorm(8), name = "Blue Trace") %>%
  add_lines(y = ~rnorm(8), name = "Orange Trace")
p
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plotly_POST(filename="legend/names")
```

### Hiding the Legend

```{r, results = 'hide'}
p %>% layout(showlegend = FALSE)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plotly_POST(filename="legend/hiding")
```

### Positioning the Legend

```{r, results = 'hide'}
p %>% layout(legend = list(x = 0.5, y = 0))
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plotly_POST(filename="legend/position")
```

### Styling the Legend

```{r, results = 'hide'}
f <- list(
  family = "sans-serif",
  size = 12,
  color = "#000"
)
l <- list(
  font = f,
  bgcolor = "#E2E2E2",
  bordercolor = "#FFFFFF",
  borderwidth = 2
)
p %>% layout(legend = l)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plotly_POST(filename="legend/style")
```

### Hiding Legend Entries

```{r, results = 'hide'}
plot_ly(x = ~seq(1, 8)) %>%
  add_trace(y = ~rnorm(8), showlegend = FALSE) %>%
  add_trace(y = ~rnorm(8), name = "Orange Trace")
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
plotly_POST(filename="legend/entry")
```
